inform_exports.title: Exports
inform_exports.description: Describe expected components of an InForm project exports. This is a list of exports from the same project for the purpose of combining thresholding strategies.

primary_phenotyping.title: Primary Phenotyping
primary_phenotyping.description: If TRUE, this is the InForm export that will be the basis for the mutually exclusive phenotypes. Only one of the exports can be a TRUE.

export_name.title: Export Name
export_name.description: This needs to be a mutually exclusive phenotype defined by the annotations.

phenotype_name.title: Phenotype Name
phenotype_name.description: This needs to be a mutually exclusive phenotype defined by the annotations.

convert_to_binary.title: Convert to Binary Phenotype
convert_to_binary.description: If TRUE, this mutually exclusive phenotype will be converted to a binary phenotype.

binary_phenotypes.title: Binary Phenotypes
binary_phenotypes.description: This is a list of binary phenotypes to keep from this project.

export_name.title: Export Name
export_name.description: This needs to be a mutually exclusive phenotype defined by the annotations.

target_name.title: Target Name
target_name.description: This is a Target Name from the panel. These should not have a trailing positive or negative sign in them defined here, since that annotation will be used when applying filters.

draw_margin_width.title: Draw Margin Width (pixels)
draw_margin_width.description: The width of tool used to draw the margin if a hand annotated file is included. Usually 10 pixels

expanded_margin_width_um.title: Expanded Margin Width (um)
expanded_margin_width_um.description: The width from the center of the margin to the edge of the margin after the watershed in microns.

region_annotation_custom_label.title: Region Annotation Custom Label
region_annotation_custom_label.description: If GIMP CUSTOM is the region annotation strategy, this is the name of the custom label <CUSTOM>.tif to find and label the region annotation mask

unannotated_region_label.title: Unannotated Region Label
unannotated_region_label.description: If GIMP CUSTOM is the region annotation strategy, this is the name of the label for any region NOT covered by the <CUSTOM>.tif mask
